page.title: 06BUDE HOLIDAY ACCOMMODATION
page.content: The Atlantic Leisure Park at Sandymouth is 32 years old and the owners have lived there since it opened in 1953.They have 142{caravans and the season starts at Easter and continues through to the end of September.The facilities they have are a shop, play area, launderette, solarium, discotheque,bar and a gymnasium.A mixture of adults and children stay there. Many tourists stay there because it is a beautiful area, the coast being owned by the{National Trust.}Tourists who stay there like it because it is quiet and peaceful. People staying at the Park really need their own transport as the area is rather isolated and is not served by any public transport.
